currentResultCard.title: Current results
currentResultCard.body: Grippenet observes flu-like symptoms which could indicate the presence of Influenza or COVID-19.

signupCard.title: Sign up
signupCard.body: Help us keep an eye on Influenza and COVID-19. Report weekly whether you experience any flu-like symptoms.

aboutCard.title: About Grippenet
aboutCard.body: Grippenet monitors the spread of flu-like symptoms in Switzerland. It is an epidemiological surveillance tool designed to monitor the spread of viruses.

infoCard.title: The science of viruses (virology)
infoCard.body: What are COVID-19 and influenza, how do they spread and what is the importance of scientific research in this field?

newsCard.title: Latest news from Grippenet
newsCard.body: We regularly update you on the ongoing COVID-19 pandemic and the Influenza season.

requiredSurveys.title: Questionnaires to be completed
requiredSurveys.info: The different questionnaires for the study can be accessed here.
requiredSurveys.successMsg: Thank you! You have completed all questionnaires. We hope to hear from you again next week. In case you want to provide new information about any flu-like symptoms sooner you can retake the questionnaire in few hours.

optionalSurveys.title: Change background information
optionalSurveys.info: If your background information has changed you can refill the background questionnaire(s) below. Unfortunately, we cannot show you the information you have entered the last time or let you change your answers to specific questions only.

teaserImage.title: Welcome to Grippenet
teaserImage.content: Get started by signing up to participate in the study
